articles.title: Television ratings for the AFC Championship game against the Broncos the highest for a Patriots game in seven years
articles.description:

articles.title: Pro Football Hall of Fame releases statement amid Bill Belichick snub
articles.description:

articles.title: How are the inductees selected for the Pro Football Hall of Fame?
articles.description:
Bill Belichick’s reported snub from the Pro Football Hall of Fame, despite winning a record six Super Bowl titles as a head coach, has renewed scrutiny of how the NFL selects its Hall of Famers.

The post How are the inductees selected for the Pro Football Hall of Fame? appeared first on Boston.com.
